mapper.insert: insert into room( roomState, roomType, shopNumber, roomNumber, roomAmount, standardPriceDay, vipPriceDay, createdTime,modifiedTime, createdUser,modifiedUser )values ( #{roomState}, #{roomType}, #{shopNumber}, #{roomNumber}, #{roomAmount}, #{standardPriceDay}, #{vipPriceDay}, now(),#{modifiedTime}, #{createdUser},#{modifiedUser} )
mapper.delete: delete from room where id=#{id} and shopNumber=#{shopNumber}
